description.value:
You easily maneuver against your foes, bringing the perfect weapon to bear to bring them low. When you use a weapon to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, the actions have a lower multiple attack penalty: –4 instead of –5 if they're the second attack on your turn, or –8 instead of –10 if they're the third or subsequent attack on your turn.

If the weapon is also Agile, the multiple attack penalties further lower to -3 if theyre the second attack and -6 if theyre the third or subsequent attack.
